author: Frank Miles
title: Rep. Ben McAdams, recovering from coronavirus in hospital, says he sometimes needs 'supplemental oxygen'
description: Rep. Ben McAdams, D-Utah, who tested positive for the coronavirus last week, and has been recovering in the hospital, said Tuesday that he sometimes needs “supplemental oxygen.”
content:
Rep. Ben McAdams, D-Utah, who tested positive for the coronavirus last week and has been recovering in the hospital, said Tuesday that he sometimes needs “supplemental oxygen.”
He said in a statement: “I remain in the hospital on advice of doctors. They are … [+2420 chars]
